downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: Developing Solutions in a Shared AOS Development Environment
downloadDescription: This white paper describes best practices for shared Application Object Server (AOS) development environments.

downloadFile.name: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Dynamics AX in a Shared AOS Development Environment_AX2012.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/e/6/0e64c342-c6ab-4d3c-83de-c0400c863aff/Developing Solutions for Microsoft Dynamics AX in a Shared AOS Development Environment_AX2012.pdf

detailsSection: Many partners create solutions in an environment in which multiple development clients connect to a single shared AOS. A shared AOS development environment can produce unpredictable results unless the guidelines in this document are followed.
detailsSection_file_name: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Dynamics AX in a Shared AOS Development Environment_AX2012.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
